name: tissue_box
description: Kleenex Cool Touch Tissues, Upright 50 count. One soft tissue is all it takes to show you care. Reach for gentle, soothing, fragrance-free Kleenex Cool Touch Tissues for a friend, a stranger or yourself. When Kleenex Cool Touch Tissues come in contact with skin, body heat activates the unique blend of moisturizers and aloe to release cooling comfort to soothe a sore nose. With the perfect balance of softness and strength, Kleenex facial tissues are durable with 2-ply thickness and are absorbent to lock in moisture. Stock up on Kleenex Tissues and keep tissues on hand to care for family, company and yourself during cold and flu season, allergy season, back-to-school and holidays. Kleenex boxes blend beautifully into your home décor. Place boxes in the living room, kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms and office. Kleenex disposable facial tissues have been there for happy tears and stuffy noses since 1924. Number of Packs: 1. Number of Sheets: 50. Scent: Unscented. Features: cool to the touch.
